alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 13 at 11:56AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Alabama, including the following county, Choctaw. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1155 AM CDT, Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Butler, Lisman, Pennington, Little Walker, Cromwell, Mount Sterling, Mollie, Jachin, Pushmataha, Robjohn, Red Springs, West Butler, Halsell, Land, Lavaca, Yantley, Pelham, Cyril, Bogueloosa and Needham. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
